metadata.title: CVE-2024-6381 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The bson_strfreev function in the MongoDB C driver library may besusceptible to an integer overflow where the function will try to freememory at a negative offset. This may result in memory corruption. Thisissue affected libbson versions prior to 1.26.2

criterions.comment: libbson package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
